deal.newsletter_subject: Up to 61% Off Circus Tickets / Pharmacy Consultation
deal.highlights:
• Choice of tickets to see the circus
  • Lions, tigers and performing horses
  • Clowns and acrobats
  • Established local favourite
deal.conditions:
Valid for shows Mon-Fri 16-24 June 2011.
1 voucher per person, may buy multiple as gifts. Voucher activates on 13 June 2011. Booking required. Tickets must be booked online before Sunday 19 June. Go to duffyscircus.com and enter "groupon2" (for 2 tickets) OR "groupon4" (family ticket) as the special offer code.

This offer cannot be booked directly at the circus.  Once a booking is made it is non-changeable and non-refundable.  Voucher must be presented when collecting tickets. Tickets are capacity restricted and subject to availability for each performance. Seating is unallocated within grandstand. Booked tickets are available to collect from the main Circus box office 45 minutes prior to the performance. Take seats a minimum of 15 minutes prior to the performance time. Latecomers may not be permitted entry once the performance starts.

See the rules that apply to all deals.
deal.meta_keywords: circus, tom duffy, dublin, acrobats, clowns, lions,
deal.meta_description: Grandstand Tickets for Two Adults (€14) or Family of Four (€25) to Tom Duffys Circus (Save Up To 61%)
deal.meta_title: Up to 61% Off Circus Tickets for Two Adults (€14) or Family of Four (€25)
deal.title: Grandstand Tickets for Two Adults (€14) or Family of Four (€25) to Tom Duffy's Circus (Save Up To 61%)

Further 50% off Ballroom course when booked at first session.
